title: Why is Akdong Musician so popular in Korea? - Quora

response.answer_text: because they're incredibly talented, first of all. they're also young, which i think makes people feel more protective of them, and they're siblings, which is rare in the industry and also endearing. and finally i think probably because netizens watched them on Kpop Star 2, so they became attached to them long before the debut. finally, aside from all of that, YG is an incredible company and they know how to market a group. most YG groups are well liked.

Because they're young, they're a cute pair of siblings, they write their own songs, and Lee Soo hyun is not your typical skinny-shapey korean idol. Her voice is amazing too. and her brother is able to coordinate playing the ukelele/guitar and sing at the same time (sometimes even rap) Their rapping is also very cute hehe Give it a shot! :-)
